entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING, Moose Jaw
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:23 a.m. CST Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Risk of freezing drizzle early this morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 30 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 12 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CST Thursday 20 April 2023
